recipesJson.name: Lumi - Puddings and Things - EP#88
recipesJson.author: mixinvixens
recipesJson.description: Blah, blah, blah. blah, blah, blah, something about flavorings...it tastes good. Lumi doesn't do descriptions.

reviews.text: Mixed this and let it steep for 5 days then started immediately sqounking it in my asgard mini, good work even with that whacked out percentages its balanced quite well. Personally I may try and raise the inw raspberry just a smidge if I remix this
